definition: Zelda (in Legend of Zelda video game)
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Lynk and Zelda had an grand presence at the booth.
sentences.chinese: 林克和塞爾達有一個在展臺隆重的存在。

sentences.english: Link may be the hero, but the game is named after Zelda.
sentences.chinese: 林克也許是主角，但是整個遊戲是以塞爾達命名的。

sentences.english: Well, Robin Williams named his daughter after her anyway.
sentences.chinese: 反正羅賓威廉斯把她的女兒叫做塞爾達了。
